content: The majority of [electricity in Singapore](/wiki/Electricity_sector_in_Singapore) comes from natural gas power plants. ## List by fuel ### Oil-fired thermal NameLocationCapacity (MW)CommissionedOwnerTypeRefs[Senoko Power Station](/wiki/Senoko_Power_Station)5001983Senoko Energy Pte LtdOilTuas Power Station6001999Tuas Power LtdOil[Pulau Seraya Power Station](/wiki/Pulau_Seraya_Power_Station)15001987-1992YTL PowerSeraya Pte LtdOil ### Gas NameLocationCapacity (MW)CommissionedOwnerTypeRefs[PacificLight Plant](/wiki/PacificLight)47, Jurong Highway, Seraya Rise, Singapore, 6276268152013[PacificLight Power Pte Ltd](/wiki/PacificLight)LNGSembCorp Cogen @ Banyan2 Banyan Road, Singapore, 6276444002014[SembCorp Cogen Pte Ltd](/wiki/SembCorp_Cogen_Pte_Ltd)NG, cogenPulau Sakra Power Station71 Sakra Avenue, Singapore, 6278768152001SembCorp Cogen Pte LtdNG, cogen[Senoko Power Station](/wiki/Senoko_Power_Station)31 Senoko Rd, Singapore 75810328001996-2012Senoko Energy Pte LtdNGTuas Power Plant60 Tuas South Ave 9, Singapore 6376071875.92001-2014Tuas Power Generation Pte LtdNGJurong Power Station16 Jurong Pier Rd, Singapore 6191752101986YTL PowerSeraya Pte LtdNG[Pulau Seraya Power Station](/wiki/Pulau_Seraya_Power_Station)3 Seraya Ave, Singapore 62820915402002-2010YTL PowerSeraya Pte LtdNGKeppel Merlimau Cogen Power Station201 Jurong Island Hwy, Singapore 62780513402007-2013Keppel Merlimau Cogen Pte LtdNG, cogenTotalSingapore9,780.9NG ### Waste to energy NameLocationCapacity (MW)CommissionedOwnerTypeRefsKeppel Seghers Tuas Waste-to-Energy Plant222009Keppel Seghers Tuas Waste-to-Energy Plant Pte LtdWaste-to-energySenoko Incineration Plant551993Keppel Infrastructure TrustWaste-to-energyTuas Incineration Plant47.81987National Environment AgencyWaste-to-energy[Tuas South Incineration Plant](/wiki/Tuas_South_Incineration_Plant)1322000[National Environment Agency](/wiki/National_Environment_Agency)Waste-to-energy ### Solar This list is incomplete;
